subject: numeracy
learning_outcomes: Count forwards and backwards to at least 20
Recognise, read and write numbers to 20
Compare and order small numbers using terms such as more, less and equal
Perform simple addition and subtraction within 10 using objects and drawings
Use number words in everyday contexts (age, quantity)
Recognise and name basic 2D shapes and simple positional words (in, on, under)
Use non-standard units to compare lengths and masses (e.g., hand spans, sticks)
topics: Counting and number recognition up to 20
Basic addition and subtraction with manipulatives
Shapes and spatial awareness: circles, squares, triangles, rectangles
Measurement with non-standard units; simple comparisons
Using numbers in real-life contexts and simple problem solving
